skills-review-story.text: Five Weeks of Mastery. Five intensive weeks of learning have transformed how you work. You've built skills that make you ten times more effective with AI. Let's review what you can now do.
Rapid Acquisition. You can master any codebase in hours, not weeks. You know how to give AI context, verify its understanding, and generate documentation that accelerates your entire team.
System Debugging. Distributed system issues no longer intimidate you. You gather the right context, generate hypotheses with AI, and systematically investigate until you find the root cause.
Platform Strategy. You design integration patterns that scale. You know when to use each pattern, how to generate compliant code, and how to verify AI output meets your standards.
AI-Augmented Design. You design systems faster without sacrificing quality. AI accelerates your process while your judgment ensures the architecture is sound.

You're Amplified. These skills make you genuinely amplified. You give AI the context it needs, verify its output intelligently, and direct it with clear designs. You're not just using AI—you're multiplied by it.

playbook-story.text: What's a Playbook?. A playbook is your documented system for how YOU use AI to multiply YOUR impact. It's personal, tested, and continuously improved. This is what separates casual AI users from amplified engineers.

Acquisition Protocol. Document your best prompts for learning codebases. Your verification checklist. Documentation templates you generate. Time targets for each phase. This becomes your standard operating procedure.
Debugging Workflow. How do you gather information for AI? What are your hypothesis generation prompts? Your investigation framework? Post-incident documentation templates? Write it all down.
Design Process. Your requirements synthesis approach. Design generation prompts. Trade-off analysis framework. Review preparation checklist. Each process systematized for consistency and speed.
Code Generation Standards. What do you delegate to AI versus do yourself? How do you review AI-generated code? Testing requirements? Common corrections you make? Define your standards clearly.
Continuous Improvement. Track what works and what doesn't. Improve your prompts over time. Share learnings with your team. A playbook is never finished—it evolves as AI capabilities evolve.

amplification-story.text: Measure Your Impact. How do you know your playbook works? Measure before and after. Track time savings, scope expansion, and quality improvements. Data proves amplification is real.
Speed Gains. Five times faster codebase onboarding. Three times faster incident resolution. Two times faster design cycles. These aren't aspirational—they're achievable with systematic AI use.
Scope Expansion. The biggest gain? Taking on projects you couldn't before. Ten times bigger scope becomes possible when AI handles the repetitive work and you focus on judgment calls.

Journey Complete. From senior engineer to amplified engineer. You've mastered rapid acquisition, system debugging, platform strategy, and AI-augmented design. You have a playbook that multiplies your impact.

The Future Is Yours. The engineers who embrace AI won't just keep their jobs. They'll take on bigger roles, more responsibility, and more impact. You're one of them now. Stay amplified, keep improving, and lead the way!
